description: This file contains CSS styles and variables for a web application, specifically for managing themes and styling various components of the application, including light and dark modes.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styling for the application including layout and theme-dependent colors.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including hover and active state effects.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the header of the application with a flexbox layout.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including size and animation.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application, specifically color and transition effects.
